summary: Added a Jewelry Vendor to Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
Added a VERY basic vendor to the open air market of Whiterun,

Arianna\'s Jewelry is a working beta, who specializes in Enchanted and Common Jewelry. Arianna shares the stand in front of the Bannered Mare with Fralia Grey-Mane.

Arianna\'s a Pawn Star :) who has a base of 1500 gold and buys/sells everything without you needing the perk.

I\'ve tested with and without all my mods on and it works perfectly for me, if however you find any problems with this mod let me know and I will attempt to solve them.

Since the on-line tutorial for creating a vendor is woefully incomplete I had to figure it out on my own, being my first vendor mod the rest of the changes I want to make are likely to take a while too, but if you like it, I will \"get â€˜er  dun\" eventually...

For now enjoy the ease of selling higher priced items without having to cycle the game\'s days or spending your perks on investing.

Future revs (if possible):
Full Jeweler Character Dialogue
Unique Items
Marriageable /Companion
Trainer in Speech Craft
Her own Stand
Favor Quest for a discount at her stand, becomes a fence without Thieves Guild Membership
Better outfit with her wearing her own jewelry.
author: yruapita
